content:
We are defining in our profile the structure of services/procedures that a health care establishment offers.

Imagine, for example, a clinic that performs Endoscopy.

My HelthcareService is simply "Endoscopy" or is it for example "Esophagogastroduodenoscopy". Which in SNOMED has the code: 760090000? And in this second case would I have to have the entire SNOMED Endoscopy procedure list represented as a HealthcareService?

By the way, IÂ´ve posted this same question on Stackoverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/70225720/wich-is-the-helathcareservice-resource-purpose

Thanks!!

@Rodrigo Sendin Thanks for cross-linking to your stack-overflow post. In general, it's best not to ask the same question in multiple places at the same time, but if you're going to, cross-linking is much appreciated. I've responded on stack overflow.
For what it's worth, stack overflow is more Google-able but this chat is quicker to respond. I sorta like the dual approach
Thanks @Lloyd McKenzie! I will not duplicate the questions again, sorry.
Rodrigo Sendin has marked this topic as resolved.
